content.user_title: Deploy advanced multi-agent swarms with dynamic coordination
content.value_statement: Complex multi-agent projects require sophisticated coordination. This skill provides systematic patterns for dynamic topology switching, self-organizing agent behaviors, and adaptive resource allocation to optimize swarm performance.
actual_capabilities: Initialize swarms with hierarchical, mesh, star, ring, or adaptive topology patterns
Spawn and coordinate specialized agents including hierarchical-coordinator, mesh-coordinator, and adaptive-coordinator
Monitor real-time performance metrics and identify bottlenecks
Apply dynamic optimizations including topology switching, agent rebalancing, and neural training
limitations: Requires Claude Flow installed and configured to execute commands
Cannot create or modify actual agent code without Claude Flow MCP
Performance improvements depend on workload characteristics and system resources
Does not replace human oversight for security and quality decisions

best_practices: Start with hierarchical or star topology for simpler workflows before advancing to mesh or adaptive patterns
Establish performance baselines before applying optimizations to measure improvement accurately
Test topology switches in non-production environments first to validate behavior
anti_patterns: Avoid switching topologies without draining active tasks first
Do not exceed recommended agent counts without verifying system resources
Avoid operating without continuous monitoring during optimization phases

faq.question: Which topologies work best for different project types?
faq.answer: Hierarchical suits task delegation, mesh enables peer collaboration, star works for simple workflows, ring handles sequential processing, and adaptive optimizes variable workloads automatically.

faq.question: What are the recommended agent limits?
faq.answer: Hierarchical supports 10 agents, mesh handles 8, and adaptive accommodates 12 agents. Scale gradually while monitoring system resource consumption.

faq.question: How does this integrate with other Claude Flow skills?
faq.answer: Swarm-advanced integrates with swarm-orchestration for complex tasks, performance-analysis for insights, and hive-mind for collective intelligence patterns.

faq.question: Is my data safe during swarm operations?
faq.answer: This skill only coordinates agents you control. All data flows within your environment. Review agent permissions before deployment and use memory coordination only for non-sensitive configuration data.

faq.question: Why is performance not improving after optimization?
faq.answer: Verify baseline metrics are accurate. Check if bottlenecks were correctly identified. Try different optimization strategies or adjust topology parameters. Some workloads may have reached natural limits.

faq.question: How does adaptive topology differ from manual switching?
faq.answer: Adaptive topology automatically monitors workloads and switches patterns based on thresholds you configure. Manual switching gives you full control but requires active monitoring and intervention.
